abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Trinidad and Tobago
            Development Finance Company Project will be on terms and
            conditions usual for Bank loans to development finance
            companies, including the standard commitment charge. It will
            help finance TTDFC's lending to productive enterprises
            covering (a) CIF cost of imported goods purchased
            off-the-shelf from domestic distributors, and (b) 35% of the
            cost of civil works (equivalent to the estimated foreign
            exchange component).
